critique: The document aims to instill a sense of confidence and security in the nation's ability to defend itself economically. It also seeks to convey a sense of urgency and preparedness in the face of a national emergency. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are likely joy (confidence in the nation's strength), and perhaps a touch of fear (to underscore the seriousness of the situation), but not too much. There might be a little surprise at the extent of the measures being taken, but overall, the goal is to project strength and control. The initial scores reflect this assessment.
